text: @realDonaldTrump Maybe it's a symptom of Covid-19 in some people? Potential loss of wit, reason and rationale...🤦🏻‍♂️ I believe it began with Nancy Antoinette and went on to spread amongst many #fakenewsoutlets #fakenewsclowns
